commit.message: added clarification that if a bug is moved to a new component once it is in the Open state then it should be moved back to the new state.
minor formatting changes, some typos fixed and clarification on fixing regressions
Fixed a couple of typos, made sure bullets start with a capital and end with a full stop - except for non-sentence bullets.  Clarified how to close a duplicate
Adjusted the wording on setting the priority
Updated the definition of a regression and a few other minor updates.
updated the Implementing a large change section
updated the definition of a regression
fixed typos and simplified a few sentences
Updates to address current round of feedback
Rewrite of the Issue Type table, minor updates, and changes for formatting consistency across the file
Updates to the JBS section to give more information on the triaging issues, the bug states and process.
